com.msopentech.odatajclient.engine.communication.request.invoke

Class ODataInvokeRequest<T extends ODataInvokeResult>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.msopentech.odatajclient.engine.communication.request.ODataRequestImpl
      • com.msopentech.odatajclient.engine.communication.request.ODataBasicRequestImpl<ODataInvokeResponse<T>,ODataPubFormat>
        • com.msopentech.odatajclient.engine.communication.request.invoke.ODataInvokeRequest<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ODataBatchableRequest, ODataBasicRequest<ODataInvokeResponse<T>,ODataPubFormat>, ODataRequest

    public class ODataInvokeRequest<T extends ODataInvokeResult>
extends ODataBasicRequestImpl<ODataInvokeResponse<T>,ODataPubFormat>
implements ODataBatchableRequest
    This class implements an OData invoke operation request. Get instance by using ODataRequestFactory.
    See Also:
    ODataInvokeRequestFactory.getInvokeRequest(java.net.URI, com.msopentech.odatajclient.engine.data.metadata.EdmMetadata, com.msopentech.odatajclient.engine.data.metadata.edm.EntityContainer.FunctionImport)
